items.subtext: Initially the search and filters were loose enough to find a vast amount of blends for various edge case searches (Java, Brazillian, Rustica), however it seems by tuning them in they've become sometimes restrictive. We're looking into this now!

items.text: Blend cards are a mess on mobile!
items.subtext: We couldn't agree more and will have this fixed ASAP!
Once the UI is completely mobile friendly, we'll begin to reimplement this feature.
